#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		char l[20005];
		char a[20005];
		scanf("%s",l);
		scanf("%s",a);
		int l1 = strlen(l),i;
		int l2 = strlen(a);
		if(l2 != l1-1)
			printf("0\n");
		else{
			for(i=0;i<l2;i++)
				if(a[i] != l[i])
				break;
			for(;i<l2;i++)
				if(a[i] != l[i+1])
				break;
			if(i == l2)
			printf("1\n");
			else
			printf("0\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
